wikipedia_page.main: Derrick Schofield (first ¼ 1928 – 25 August 1999) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1940s and 1950s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, England and Lancashire, and at club level for Rochdale Hornets (two spells), Halifax (Heritage № 651), Castleford (Heritage № 409) and Dewsbury, as a wing, or second-row, i.e. number 2 or 5, or, 11 or 12.

link_mentions.page: List of Great Britain national rugby league team players

response: * Derrick Schofield won caps for England while at Rochdale Hornets 1952 Wales, 1953 France, and won caps for Great Britain while at Halifax 1955 New Zealand
